author: dag
msg: DERBY-4269 Failover did not succeed in 2 min.: testReplication_Local_3_p6_autocommit_OK

author: stsp
msg: Make 'svn merge' print the conflict summary before showing output from the
conflict resolver, and also restrict post-merge interactive resolution
to paths which got new conflicts flagged during the merge operation.
Corresponds to changes made for 'svn update' in r1357298 and r1357313.
(svn_cl__merge): Postpone conflict resolution during the merge operation.
Run the conflict resolver on any paths which got conflicts flagged during

author: gjm
msg: dashboard: fix error with dashboard widgets attempting to deal with no Versions (and similar) - fixes #122

author: veithen
msg: Fixed a couple of potential NPEs in the hasFault and getFault methods of the SOAPBody implementations.
